Articles.Content:
I was fooling around with the .mbm converter, and I tested it out on the stock launch clamp, and look what I found in the bottom right corner,

![WfWf9uV.png](http://i.imgur.com/WfWf9uV.png)

It's Clamps!

![clamps.jpg](https://ochemonline.files.wordpress.com/2010/03/clamps.jpg)
Oh thank god, somebody finally found it. I forgot I put that there, actually.
That. Is. Awesome! Has anyone else found it yet? I sure haven't seen it mentioned anywhere.

> 
> Oh thank god, somebody finally found it. I forgot I put that there, actually.

Lol, so is that actually visible in game?

> 
> Lol, so is that actually visible in game?

I don't think so. I think it's an unused part of the texture.

> 
> Lol, so is that actually visible in game?

It isn't. Thinking about it, I believe *someone* found it a long time ago when they were poking through recombobulated MBMs, but I can't remember for sure.

> 
> Oh thank god, somebody finally found it. I forgot I put that there, actually.

Wow, Nova. Brilliant XD

My first reaction:

![latest?cb=20150123021911](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/epicrapbattlesofhistory/images/8/89/500px-Oh-you-show.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150123021911)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-01T21:56:47Z" title="03/01/2015 09:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 1, 2015</time> by zekes**
Ye gods, what other easter eggs are yet to be found? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
Wait... have I been transported to 2012? I am certain this was already found? Or was it a different robot? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

That is BRILLIANT!

I even still sometimes make references to that robot from the show. "*Or clamp-like device...*"
That's awesome! How has nobody reported this before?
Eh, its been found a couple of times. As in like 2 years ago..![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Amazing find! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Lol nice.
Nice Find!

> 
> It isn't. Thinking about it, I believe *someone* found it a long time ago when they were poking through recombobulated MBMs, but I can't remember for sure.

I know it's been posted before, but it was way long ago. When I saw the title of this post I was curious if it was a different Easter egg :-)

...are there any others?
Haha.. nice find! How did you end up finding it? Just looking at the textures?

> 
> Haha.. nice find! How did you end up finding it? Just looking at the textures?

I'm trying to get into making some part mods, and I was getting all the Unity side of things set up, and I'd thought I'd test out the .mbm converter on something.
I never knew this existed. Great find.

> 
> Eh, its been found a couple of times. As in like 2 years ago..![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Phew... I was not crazy after all...

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/33955-Did-we-find-all-of-the-easter-eggs-yet/page2?p=423149#post423149](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/33955-Did-we-find-all-of-the-easter-eggs-yet/page2?p=423149#post423149)

I couldn't find out who discovered it first though
